aboutPage.title: About Petzon
aboutPage.missionText: At Petzon, our mission is to connect hearts and homes. We believe that every pet deserves a second chance and a loving home. Our platform facilitates responsible adoption, uniting pets in need with people willing to offer care, affection, and a lifelong family.
aboutPage.visionText: We dream of a world where all pets are loved, respected, and have a safe home. We want to be the bridge that transforms the lives of pets and people, promoting awareness about the importance of adoption and animal welfare.
aboutPage.creatorsText: Petzon was conceived and passionately developed by Lucas Gabryel and Hugo Santos, two technology enthusiasts and animal lovers dedicated to making a difference in pets' lives.
aboutPage.getInvolvedText: If you're looking for a new family member or want to help a pet in need, you're in the right place. Explore our gallery, meet our adorable candidates, and get ready to have your life transformed by the unconditional love of a pet.
